author: Staff Reporter
text:
Amid tight security, Mohammad Hanifa of Tenkasi, who was arrested in connection with the cases of planting of pipe bomb at Tirumangalam and Auditor Ramesh murder, was produced before Principal District and Sessions Court here on Tuesday.

After hearing the case, Principal District Judge R. Poornima adjourned the case till March 28 for the next hearing.

Police brought him from Tiruchi Central Prison and produced him before the court. Security had been tightened in the court complex since morning.

Prosecution said that a team of police personnel from Madurai apprehended Nagoor Hanifa alias Mohamed Hanifa (35) from a hideout at Batlagundu in Dindigul district last year. When the special team, led by Deputy Superintendent of Police Karthikeyan, attempted to arrest him, he assaulted the DSP in a bid to escape.

The defence counsel, after getting the court’s permission, interacted with Hanifa inside the court hall for some time.
title: Hanifa produced before court
